title: The Cosmic Playbook for Writers: 30 Vital Mini Meditations to Boost Your Creativity, Resilience & Passion
description: The Cosmic Playbook for Writers is a powerful collection of daily creative inspiration that serves as meditation and mindfulness tools for writers. The mini meditations are specifically designed with tips for authors and writers to unleash their creativity.When it comes to writing, there are always going to be mental stumbling blocks or hurdles that we need to push through and overcome.
